class.name: RopePositions
class.brief_description: A class for describing anchor and attachment node positions.
class.description: This resource is used to describe multiple locations along a rope. Positions are a scalar [0..1] mapping to the [code]rope_length[/code] value, where 0.0 is the beginning of the rope and 1.0 is the end of the rope.

method.name: set_position
method.description: Position of the node along the rope, as a scalar [0..1] of the [code]rope_length[/code]. 0.0 is the start of the rope and 1.0 is the end of the rope.

method.name: set_node
method.description: NodePath to the node to be anchored or attached at the position.
